label: Neurological Disorders
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to neurological disorders and their treatment.
intents: Find information on symptoms and treatment options for neurological disorders.
Learn about the latest research and breakthroughs in neurological disorder treatment.
Connect with support groups and resources for individuals with neurological disorders.

subcategories.label: Parkinson's Disease
subcategories.description: A degenerative disorder of the nervous system that affects movement.

subcategories.label: Multiple Sclerosis
subcategories.description: A chronic autoimmune disease that affects the central nervous system.

subcategories.label: Stroke
subcategories.description: A medical emergency that occurs when blood flow to the brain is interrupted.

subcategories.label: Neuropathy
subcategories.description: A disorder that affects the nerves and can cause pain, numbness, and weakness.

subcategories.label: Motor Neuron Disease
subcategories.description: A group of diseases that affect the nerves in the brain and spinal cord that control muscle movement.

subcategories.label: Dementia
subcategories.description: A group of symptoms that affect memory, thinking, and social abilities.

subcategories.label: Cerebral Palsy
subcategories.description: A group of disorders that affect movement, posture, and muscle tone.

subcategories.label: Restless Leg Syndrome
subcategories.description: A condition that causes an uncontrollable urge to move the legs, often accompanied by uncomfortable sensations.

subcategories.label: Aneurysm
subcategories.description: A bulge in a blood vessel that can cause serious health problems if it ruptures.
